Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

Kraftlos,

With so few players I have taken on more of a GM's role to keep things
moving, including taking on the roles of many of the toy or toon based
characters, but that can easily change as more people return. I had
insulated your section until you returned, so that nothing would happen that
you didn't want or expect. But that also means that your players are largely
in the dark :)

The easiest thing to do would be have your characters call in for an update
since I am sure they are as curious as you are. :)

From communication chatter your team would have heard and/or deduced that
Tuscon and some others went to recover Rodimus once and for all using some
ruse that he and Nightshift had cooked up. Tuscon and others were eventually
captured but then somehow got free, and at first appeared successful at
recovering Rodimus but soon after communications were lost with Tuscon and
his team as he attempted to make his way back.

He has since returned bringing back a heavily damaged Rodimus and a
Predacon.

Sandy,

You are exactly right, I was wondering why nobody responded to my post. I
can see where it was sent out, and all the tags on my side said that it was,
but I see nothing on the list. I guess now I see :)

I will resend.

Thanks,
Preston

--0050450146f3cbcc6e0489f70842
